title: Stepchild, Big Brother, and Mug Shot
teaser:
Comic TIg Notaro details her complicated relationship with her step-father; a New York City cop on a bust discovers the value of a mug shot; and a teenager rebels after her brother is disowned.  

Hosted by The Mothâ€™s Producing Director, Sarah Austin Jenness.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
contentencoded:
Tig Notaro must find new ground with her step-father after her mother’s sudden death.
Steve Osborne  arrives at a bust heavily armed and carrying an important mug shot.
Shewit Zarai stands with her brother when he comes out to their conservative parents.
